title: CTU leader who vacationed while claiming it’s unsafe to return to school apologizes
content:
1. CTU leader who vacationed while claiming it’s unsafe to return to school apologizes  WGN TV Chicago
  2. Safety Concerns Will Keep Some CPS Teachers From Returning To Classrooms  CBS Chicago
  3. Chicago schools push forward with reopening plan despite teachers union, city council objections  Fox News
  4. As Chicago Teachers Union members refuse to return to classrooms, CPS mum on possible consequences for those who decline to give lessons in person  Chicago Tribune
  5. Covid live updates: Fauci pushes back on Trump claims, first Oxford-AstraZeneca shots given in U.K.  NBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: CTU领导人一边度假一边声称返回学校不安全，向他道歉
CTU領導人一邊度假一邊聲稱返回學校不安全，向他道歉
